citeinfo.origin: Japan Coast Guard, Hydrographic and Oceanographic Department, Japan Oceanographic Data Center (JODC)
citeinfo.title: JODC Temperature, Salinity, Oxygen and Nutrient Profiles

descript.abstract:
Oceanographic data (temperature, salinity, oxygen, and nutrients) at various depths from multi-bottle Nansen casts or other types of water samplers over the IOC-WESTPAC area. Data are distributed by J-DOSS JODC Data Online Service System) through INTERNET. Data selected through on-line searches can be downloaded by FTP. Summary information, plots and statistics are available at the URL associated with this metadata record. These data are also included in the World Ocean Database 1998.
[ A TCODE project ]
descript.purpose: To document ocean conditions in the IOC-WESTPAC area.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
